potapovQuest.scripts:
LOG = globals().get('LOG') """:type: typing.LOG_DEBUG_DEV"""
QUEST_EVENT_TYPE = globals().get('QUEST_EVENT_TYPE') """:type: quest_definitions.QUEST_EVENT_TYPE"""
quest_progress = globals().get('quest_progress') """:type: quest_progress"""
filter = globals().get('BattleResults')
PROGRESS_ID_MAIN = 'markOfMasteryI' PROGRESS_ID_MAIN_SERIES = 'markOfMasteryISeries' PROGRESS_ID_ADD = "markOfMasteryMaster" PROGRESS_SERIES = 'markOfMasteryMasterSeries'
def onInit(eventType, eventData, quest, processor): for event in events.iterkeys(): processor.subscribe(event, quest) return True
def onFinishBattle(eventType, eventData, quest, processor): questProgress = quest_progress.BaseQuestProgress(quest.config, processor.getQuestProgress(quest.progressID))
brfilter = filter.BattleResultsFilter(eventData) addCondition = bool(eventData['avatarResults'].get('markOfMastery', None) >= questProgress.getProgress(PROGRESS_ID_ADD).getParam("markOfMastery")) if addCondition: questProgress.setCompleted(PROGRESS_ID_ADD) questProgress.increaseUntilComplete(PROGRESS_SERIES, 1) mainCondition = bool(eventData['avatarResults'].get('markOfMastery', None) >= questProgress.getProgress(PROGRESS_ID_MAIN).getParam("markOfMastery")) if mainCondition: questProgress.setCompleted(PROGRESS_ID_MAIN) questProgress.increaseUntilComplete(PROGRESS_ID_MAIN_SERIES, 1)
eventData['results'].update(processor.checkComplete(questProgress, quest.progressID, additionalProgressID=PROGRESS_SERIES)) processor.setQuestProgress(quest.progressID, questProgress.save())
events = { QUEST_EVENT_TYPE.INIT: onInit, QUEST_EVENT_TYPE.FINISH_BATTLE: onFinishBattle, }
def quest(eventType, eventData, quest, processor): LOG('QUEST EVENT:', eventType, quest.id) return events.get(eventType, lambda *args: False)(eventType, eventData, quest, processor)
